pageContext.claim: “Because he's running the Senate. I mean, Mitch McConnell has been fantastic. He has been really great. He's right at the top of everything that we're doing, and he's really been fantastic.”
pageContext.analysis: At a news conference about the government shutdown, Trump was joined by House Republican leaders and was asked why Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell was not present. Trump said "because he's running the Senate," but the chamber was not in session.
